item.title: My first Script
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

That seems alright, but you should try adding a quit key instead of adding a never ending loop. You could make it so that when someone presses a Function Key a message appears in the box. Here is a quick little example of an AutoTalker i pulled up for you to learn from:[code]program New;

const
Message1 = ‘Hello’;
Message2 = ‘Hi’;
Message3 = ‘What is up?’);

procedure DetectFKey;
begin
if(IsFKeyDown(2)) then //If the F2 key is down it will…
begin
SendKeys(Message1); //type the first message really fast.
end;
if(IsFKeyDown(3)) then //If the F3 key is down it will…
begin
SendKeys(Message2); //type the second message really fast.
end;
if(IsFKeyDown(4)) then //If the F4 key is down it will…
begin
SendKeys(Message3); //type the third message really fast.
end;
end;

begin
repeat
DetectFKey; //Will start running the DetectFKey procedure.
Until(IsFKeyDown(5)) //Will stop the repeat if the F5 key is down.
end.[/code]

Enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: My first Script
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Well Sometime the bests of scripts are the simplest; I would love feedback flaming and more feedback on whats good bad, I tried my best to script ‘clean code’ and use a saying Don’t capitalize the bold. That’s what Kaitnieks use to say, ‘uneeded and ugly’. (got it off someone here :P) I’ve know I should put comments but I feel people who understand this script don’t need them, new people do though.

[code]{

My first working SCAR script
Created By Bootnecklad

Thing I learned while making this script:
Don’t capitalize the bold. That’s what Kaitnieks use to say, ‘uneeded and ugly’.
Use clean code, bad code looks ugly and crap.

}

program hello;

const
Message1=‘Hello,’;
Message2=‘This is Bootnecklads first Script’;
Message3=‘Goodbye’;

procedure hello;
begin
wait(1000)
Writeln(Message1);
wait(500)
Writeln(Message2);
wait(500)
Writeln(Message3);
end;

begin
repeat
Hello;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Basically it writes:
Hello,
This is Bootnecklads first Script
Goodbye

And repeats that until the script is stopped

comment please

For my next script I’m gonna make a simple Talker.

Read full topic
